topics.body:
. . . . Ughhhhhhhhhhh. . . So apparently the Republicans are planning other government shutdowns.  No I didn't fucking stutter; shutdowns, as in plural.

What do they want to use government shutdowns over?  Every god damn social issue.  Basically if the Republicans do gain control of the senate this fall it's going to literally be by one or two seats What's worse is they didn't list how long they would keep the government shutdown; it could be only a couple days, it could be two years.  So long as their demands aren't caved into the government will remain shut down.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Background Pony #E202":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53f4ca0a6368726ace830200#post_53f4ca0a6368726ace830200
Pretty much; to summarize a long explanation: post-2016 the republicans are pretty much in their current political ideal are going to go extinct so conservatives are dropping a-
!http://www.examiner.com/images/blog/EXID6870/images/martydom.jpg!

Social conservatism is about to die hard; long explanation short is that they've lost the populace on stuff like gay marriage, pot, the war on drugs, "tough on crime" and numerous other social issues so rather than going quietly they're going to try to take out as much of a the usa economically as they can possibly get.  It's not even anymore about politics; rather it's like that moment in monopoly whenever someone knows they're going to lose so they flip the board.  In this case it's not just a monopoly board but the soldiers who receive pay from the government, police officer's salaries, teacher's salaries and so forth.
